translation.en: -[woman] You ready. Here we go. -[man] Born ready. Come on.
translation.zh:
-亲爱的 准备好了吗？开始了
-老早准备好了 来吧

translation.en: [woman] They're gonna be surprised.
translation.zh:
-他们肯定想不到的
-来吧

translation.en: -[man] Let's do it. -[woman] Straighten your cane.
translation.zh:
拐仗竖直 -准备好了吗？五、六、七、八
-七、八

translation.en: [both] A five, six, seven, eight.
translation.zh:
-准备好了吗？五、六、七、八
-七、八

translation.en: Hey, kids. Kids, it's time for the annual Christmas video.
translation.zh: 嗨 孩子们 来拍年度圣诞视频吧

translation.en: Uh, not right now, Mom.
translation.zh: 妈 现在没空

translation.en: What are you talking about? You used to love these.
translation.zh: 说什么呢？你以前特爱拍圣诞视频的

translation.en: The key word being "used to."
translation.zh: 重点是“以前”

translation.en: I think we're too old for that. It's kind of embarrassing.
translation.zh:
我们都长大了
不适合拍这种视频 很丢脸的

translation.en: How about you, buddy? Come on. Wyatt, can you hear me?
translation.zh:
小子 你呢？来吧
怀亚特 听得见吗？

translation.en: Grab your guitar. Let's do this.
translation.zh: 去拿吉他过来 一起拍视频吧

translation.en: You just made me die in the Dwarf Mines.
translation.zh: 你刚刚害我死在《矮人矿场》里了

translation.en: How about joining us in the physical world?
translation.zh: 那你就回到现实一起拍视频 好吗？

translation.en: Five minutes.
translation.zh: 就五分钟

translation.en: I tried the physical realm… I will take the digital realm.
translation.zh:
现实世界我体验过了
我决定回到数码世界

translation.en: -Miles? -Miles.
translation.zh:
-迈尔斯？
-迈尔斯

translation.en: -You with us, buddy? -Miles.
translation.zh:
-小子 要一起拍吗？
-迈尔斯

translation.en: -Pickles. -Where is Pickles?
translation.zh:
-泡菜
-泡菜呢？

translation.en: -Oh God. -Pickles.
translation.zh:
-天啊
-泡菜

translation.en: [man] The tree is not your territory.
translation.zh: 圣诞树不是你的领地

translation.en: Oh, honey, watch out. Your cane. You're hooked. You're hooked.
translation.zh:
亲爱的 小心你头上的糖果手杖
你被勾住了

translation.en: I'm okay. We're okay.
translation.zh: 没事的 大家都没事

translation.en: [woman] Hey, Bill, when did this family give up on Christmas?
translation.zh:
比尔 我们这家人
从什么时候开始放弃庆祝圣诞节的？

translation.en: New rule in this house. No more tinsel.
translation.zh: 以后家里再也不准用金箔装饰

translation.en: I mean, CC used to just love making those holiday videos.
translation.zh: 茜茜以前很喜欢拍圣诞视频的

translation.en: I mean, this stuff just gets everywhere.
translation.zh: 到处都是金箔

translation.en: And Wyatt was a natural performer. He had moves like Jagger.
translation.zh:
怀亚特天生就有表演细胞
他跳起舞来舞王范儿十足

translation.en: How does so much pee come out of that tiny, little dog?
translation.zh: 那只狗小得可以 尿量却那么大？

translation.en: I worry that we're all kind of disconnected.
translation.zh: 恐怕我们一家人

translation.en: Sorry, did you ask me something?
translation.zh: 什么？你在问我什么事吗？

translation.en: -Hmm. Sorry? -What? Hmm.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-什么？

translation.en: -It's fine. -I can't hear-- What?
translation.zh:
-算了
-我听不到 什么？

translation.en: -No. No. -Oh.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: -Okay. -[both] Good night.
translation.zh:
-那就好 晚安
-晚安

translation.en: [man on radio] Good morning, Los Angeles. Only three days till Christmas,
translation.zh:
洛杉矶的朋友们 早上好
再过三天就是圣诞季了

translation.en: and another hot holiday season here in the Southland.
translation.zh: 都会区再度迎来炙热的圣诞假日

translation.en: Don't forget us, Santa Claus.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人 千万别忘记我们

translation.en: Seventy-six degrees, and the mercury is rising.
translation.zh: 目前气温是摄氏24度 气温连连攀升

translation.en: Speaking of Mercury, make sure to look at the sky tonight
translation.zh:
说到连连攀升
今晚记得要抬头仰望天空

translation.en: for a once-in-a-lifetime planetary alignment.
translation.zh: 观赏千年一遇的“行星连珠”奇观

translation.en: And of course, keep listening to 99.3 KMCG to catch the Christmas spirit.
translation.zh:
务必继续收听99.3KMCG频道
感受圣诞气氛

translation.en: [woman] Okay. Really good ideas, team. But don't do anything without me.
translation.zh:
队友们  这些想法都很好
但在我抵达前别做任何决定

translation.en: I'll get after it when I get in.
translation.zh: 我一到办公室就跟进

translation.en: CC!
translation.zh: 茜茜

translation.en: Oh my goodness.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Do you think it's good for you to live like this?
translation.zh: 你说在这种环境中生活合适吗？

translation.en: Mom, I'm trying to get ready for my game. I don't need a clean-room lecture.
translation.zh:
妈 我在努力为比赛做好准备
没必要听你教我怎么整理房间

translation.en: It all ties together. A disorganized room means a--
translation.zh:
心境与环境是一体的
房间乱糟糟意味着…

translation.en: A disorganized mind. Yes, I know.
translation.zh: 内心也杂乱无章 没错 我懂

translation.en: It affects everything, including your soccer.
translation.zh:
环境足以影响一切
包括你在足球运动中的表现

translation.en: More importantly, your grades.
translation.zh: 更重要的是 你的学术表现

translation.en: If I hope to play for the national team,
translation.zh: 如果我想加入国家队

translation.en: I need to focus on practice, not cleaning my room.
translation.zh:
那就必须专注于练习
而不是整理房间

translation.en: Heads up.
translation.zh: 注意

translation.en: You're not supposed to use your hands.
translation.zh: 用手接球就是犯规了

translation.en: In the kitchen, 12 minutes.
translation.zh: 12分钟后厨房集合

translation.en: Hey, Bill?
translation.zh: 比尔 你在哪里？

translation.en: -Bill. You okay? -Yes. Yes.
translation.zh:
-比尔 你还好吗？
-没事

translation.en: I'm hanging out. You know how much the baby loves the Camaro.
translation.zh:
我只是在这放松一下
你懂宝宝有多喜欢这辆科迈罗了

translation.en: -Oh, the baby. -Where's Mommy?
translation.zh:
-宝宝
-妈妈呢？

translation.en: You driving it to work now that it's done?
translation.zh: 车改装好了 你打算开去上班？

translation.en: -Show it off? -You kidding me?
translation.zh:
-开出门炫耀？
-开什么玩笑？

translation.en: You put this much time into a car, you don't drive it.
translation.zh:
你花这么多心思改造这辆车
却不开出门？

translation.en: I mean, you barely even touch it. You just bask in its power and beauty.
translation.zh:
你几乎完全没碰过它
只是陶醉于它的威力和美好

translation.en: When you're done basking,
translation.zh: 等你醉醒后

translation.en: can you make sure Wyatt is up and dressed and in the kitchen ready for the meeting?
translation.zh:
能确保怀亚特已经起身、换好衣服
准备好在厨房里开家庭会议了吗？

translation.en: Spock, your work was impeccable as always.
translation.zh: 史波克 一如既往 你的设计无懈可击

translation.en: But I figured out why that lens you fabricated isn't refracting properly.
translation.zh:
但我想到为什么
你仿造的透镜折射效果不佳了

translation.en: You forgot to square the C.
translation.zh: 你忘了对“C”进行开平方操作

translation.en: Your work is exquisite.
translation.zh: 你的设计果然所向无敌

translation.en: No, my 1999 PSA-graded 10 holo Charizard is exquisite.
translation.zh:
不对 我的1999年PSA10级
全息喷火龙游戏卡才所向无敌

translation.en: I am envious of that card indeed.
translation.zh: 真羡慕你有这张游戏卡

translation.en: Wyatt, family meeting downstairs. Let's go!
translation.zh: 怀亚特 下楼开家庭会议了 走吧

translation.en: Who's this? Are these your smart friends?
translation.zh: 这是谁啊？你那些高智商的朋友吗？

translation.en: The algebros?
translation.zh: 什么“代数达人”吗？

translation.en: Guys, I gotta go. Spock, tell Elon he owes me another one.
translation.zh:
各位 我要下线了
史波克 跟埃隆说他欠我一个人情

translation.en: So I was just thinking, maybe after school today, we can hang out.
translation.zh:
我在想 等你放学后
也许我们可以一起出去玩

translation.en: I can teach you how to drive.
translation.zh: 我可以教你怎么开车

translation.en: Gasoline engines are an abuse of science.
translation.zh:
使用燃油发动机
是一种滥用科学的行为

translation.en: And you know this. I'm too scared to drive.
translation.zh: 而且你也懂的 我有开车恐惧症

translation.en: I'm also in the middle of a lot of prep for my Yale interview.
translation.zh:
我正在紧锣密鼓地
为耶鲁大学的面试做准备

translation.en: I really can't slack off.
translation.zh: 绝不能偷懒

translation.en: Totally get it. Totally get it.
translation.zh: 我完全理解

translation.en: Can you, uh, can you help me with this problem?
translation.zh: 能帮我解决这道难题吗？

translation.en: -I'm kidding. You can't help me. -No, I can't.
translation.zh:
-跟你闹着玩的 你帮不了我
-没错 我帮不了你

translation.en: Okay, I'm calling this meeting to order.
translation.zh: 好 我宣布会议正式开始

translation.en: We have a major few days ahead of us.
translation.zh: 接下来几天都是大日子

translation.en: -CC, do I have your attention? -Yeah, I'm looking for my homework.
translation.zh:
-茜茜 你有没有在听？
-有啊 我在找作业

translation.en: [woman] Looking for it like a completed assignment,
translation.zh: 你要找的作业已经做完了吗？

translation.en: or like school starts in 20 minutes, and you need to get started?
translation.zh:
还是作业要在20分钟后提交
你在临时抱佛脚？

translation.en: That'll be option B, Mom.
translation.zh: 妈 答案是后者

translation.en: When do you find out if you got into college early?
translation.zh:
你提前进入大学的消息
什么时候才会宣布？

translation.en: I would really love to help you pack.
translation.zh: 我十分乐意帮你收拾行李

translation.en: I detect sarcasm, which is universally regarded as the lowest form of humor.
translation.zh:
我感应到你话中带刺
这种行为普遍上被视为最低级的幽默

translation.en: Let's, uh, move this along. You know if we talk too much, he just clenches up.
translation.zh:
我们速战速决吧
如果话太多 宝宝会变得紧张不安

translation.en: Right. Tomorrow is a big, big day for the Walkers.
translation.zh:
好的 明天是我们沃克家
最忙碌的日子

translation.en: We have Wyatt's Yale interview,
translation.zh: 怀亚特将接受耶鲁大学面试

translation.en: CC's championship soccer game. I have my huge presentation at work--
translation.zh: 茜茜的足球锦标赛开打 我也要发表一场重大的讲演

translation.en: Don't forget about the Planetarium today after school.
translation.zh: 别忘记今天放学后要去天文馆

translation.en: I was getting to that. We're going to Wyatt's thing.
translation.zh:
正要说这事
我们要跟怀亚特一起去天文馆

translation.en: I have band practice.
translation.zh: 我要去练团

translation.en: Dad or Alive is playing at the school holiday party.
translation.zh:
老爸敢死乐队
将在学校圣诞假日派对上演出

translation.en: This could be my second chance.
translation.zh: 这搞不好是我翻身的大好机会

translation.en: I really don't wanna go to Wyatt's boring thing.
translation.zh: 我很不想跟怀亚特去天文馆

translation.en: It's a quintuple planetary alignment.
translation.zh: 这可是五星连珠啊

translation.en: It's a galactic confluence of the highest order of magnitude.
translation.zh: 是千年难得一见的星系会合

translation.en: It's my interstellar white whale.
translation.zh: 是我日盼夜盼的天文奇景

translation.en: Okay, seriously, who's his real father?
translation.zh: 够了 说实话 他的生父到底是谁？

translation.en: [woman] Look, you guys might not care about Christmas, but I do.
translation.zh:
听好 你们可能对圣诞节不感冒
但我在乎这个节日

translation.en: So we are all going to the Planetarium this afternoon.
translation.zh: 所以今天下午 我们都要去天文馆

translation.en: I have a cute holiday sweater. I want a picture.
translation.zh:
我有件可爱的圣诞长袖衫
我要穿着它拍照

translation.en: We are gonna make a happy memory as a family.
translation.zh:
我们一家大小
将一起创造一个幸福美好的回忆

translation.en: Can this meeting be adjourned?
translation.zh: 可以散会了吗？

translation.en: Meeting adjourned.
translation.zh: 散会

translation.en: -Ava! -CC!
translation.zh:
-艾娃
-茜茜

translation.en: [all] Go, CC! Go, CC! Go, CC!
translation.zh: 茜茜 加油

translation.en: [boy] Yo, hold on.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -Yo, put your hands on the moneymaker. -Hey, I got it!
translation.zh:
-把手按在财神身上
-我知道

translation.en: -I'm a Spartan! Ah! -Where the hell is he?
translation.zh:
-我是斯巴达人
-他到底在哪里？

translation.en: -I promise you-- -I am Hunter Drew!
translation.zh:
-我答应你…
-我是汉特·德鲁

translation.en: I'm the Spartan!
translation.zh: 我是斯巴达人

translation.en: [all cheering] Go, CC! Go, CC! Go, CC!
translation.zh: 茜茜 加油

translation.en: -Whoa. Walker. -[record scratches]
translation.zh: 天啊 沃克

translation.en: You're standing in the hallway and staring at Ariana?
translation.zh: 你竟然站在走廊上盯着爱莉安娜看？

translation.en: Yo, Ariana! Dude, this kid's trying to creep!
translation.zh:
爱莉安娜
天啊 这小子开始变得奇怪了

translation.en: I'm sorry. I promise--
translation.zh: 对不起 我答应…

translation.en: You just got obliterated, son!
translation.zh: 小子 你被彻底击败了

translation.en: [muffled] You're a loser, Walker.
translation.zh: 你是窝囊废

translation.en: [Bill] One, two, three.
translation.zh: 一、二、三

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Uh, you-- Uh, cut, cut for a second.
translation.zh: 暂停一下

translation.en: Um, there's tension. Do you feel the tension in this room?
translation.zh:
紧绷感 你们有没有感到
房里充斥着一股紧绷感？

translation.en: We gotta be loose. Toss your music. Toss your sheet music.
translation.zh: 要放松 乐谱扔掉 凭感觉演奏

translation.en: Get rid of it. Emma, why are you raising your hand?
translation.zh: 乐谱扔掉 为什么举手？

translation.en: Embrace the anarchy. Just call it out. What do you got?
translation.zh:
享受这种奔放的感觉 豁出去
有什么问题吗？

translation.en: How do we play the song without sheet music?
translation.zh: 没有乐谱要怎么演奏啊？

translation.en: How did Luke Skywalker blow up the Death Star without his computer?
translation.zh:
卢克·天行者不用电脑
也能炸毁死星啊 他怎么做到的？

translation.en: I don't know what that means. I was born in 2008.
translation.zh: 我听不懂 我是2008年出生的

translation.en: Okay. Um…
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Baxter?
translation.zh: 巴克斯特呢？

translation.en: -He used the Force. -[Bill] Yes!
translation.zh:
-他用原力
-没错

translation.en: What's the Force?
translation.zh: “原力”是什么？

translation.en: The Force is this enigmatic energy
translation.zh: 原力是一种奇特的能量

translation.en: that's inside all of us, and it's good.
translation.zh: 存在于我们身心之内 是一种正能量

translation.en: Guys, you're in a band. You're not individual players.
translation.zh:
各位 你们是一支乐队
不是独立的乐手

translation.en: You guys are a thing. You're one thing.
translation.zh: 你们是一体的 是一个整体

translation.en: So get out of your heads and get into everyone's heart.
translation.zh:
要跳出自己的框框
进入每个乐队成员心里

translation.en: You, walk a mile in her shoes. Walk a mile in his shoes.
translation.zh: 你跟她换位思考 你则跟他换位思考

translation.en: Everybody, just try to feel what it means to be a collective.
translation.zh: 大家试着去感受一体同心的感觉

translation.en: Now, come on. Let's give Jack White the honor he deserves.
translation.zh:
来吧 让我们给予
杰克·怀特应有的尊重

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 开始

translation.en: Drums, please.
translation.zh: 鼓声 来吧

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Melody, strings.
translation.zh: 旋律进来 弦乐进来

translation.en: Woodwinds. Bring it up. Let's go.
translation.zh: 木管 预备 开始

translation.en: Who's feeling it?
translation.zh: 谁感觉到了？

translation.en: Oh, boy.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Cymbals, get ready. Cymbals.
translation.zh: 铜钹 预备

translation.en: Did you feel that?
translation.zh: 感觉到了吗？

translation.en: What-- That--
translation.zh: 什么？这…

translation.en: Something's going on. I gotta take just a second.
translation.zh: 有急事 我去处理一下

translation.en: McCracken, you're in charge. Uh, run through "Jingle Bells."
translation.zh:
麦克拉肯 这里交给你了
练一遍《铃儿响叮当》

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我去去就回来

translation.en: Guys, what's up with the emergency Dad or Alive meeting?
translation.zh:
各位 老爸敢死乐队
怎么突然召开紧急会议了？

translation.en: Do not tell me, Lake, that you sprained your whammy wrist again.
translation.zh: 别告诉你走衰运 又扭伤了手腕

translation.en: No, we heard from a little TV show called So You Think You Can Rock?
translation.zh:
不是 知道《摇滚争霸战》
这部小型综艺节目吧？

translation.en: -What? -We got the audition! Yeah!
translation.zh:
-什么？
-我们受邀去试镜了 好耶

translation.en: Guys, do not mess with me. I'm super fragile right now.
translation.zh:
各位 别忽悠我
这一刻 我的心灵非常脆弱

translation.en: There's a TV crew coming here to the school dance on Friday
translation.zh: 周五剧组将派人来拍摄学校舞会

translation.en: for a live broadcast.
translation.zh: 现场直播

translation.en: Dad or Alive is about to be famous!
translation.zh: 老爸敢死乐队要火了

translation.en: What? This is insane!
translation.zh: 什么？太不可思议了

translation.en: -It's incredible. Come on! -Yes!
translation.zh:
-很难想象吧 来啊
-好极了

translation.en: ♪ You're packed and you're stacked 'Specially in the back ♪
translation.zh: 你身材丰满 性感无比 特别是后背

translation.en: ♪ Brother, wanna thank your mother For a butt like that ♪
translation.zh: 哥儿 真想感谢你妈赐你这种美臀

translation.en: ♪ Or a shotgun, bang What's up with that thang ♪
translation.zh: 上膛开炮 这是什么玩意？

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know, how does it hang?
translation.zh: 好想知道能撑多久

translation.en: "Straight up, wait up, hold up, Mr. Lover Like Prince said, you're a sexy mother--"
translation.zh:
多情哥 废话少说 暂停 稍等
正如普林斯说的 你这火辣的贱货

translation.en: You'll have to work harder to stump me on iconic ladies of the '90s, Gus, Gus.
translation.zh:
如果你想用90年代名曲考倒我
劝你找一首更有深度的歌

translation.en: You're so good.
translation.zh: 你好厉害

translation.en: -All your faves. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
-全是你的最爱
-谢了

translation.en: Would they be holiday cookies without M&M's?
translation.zh: 没有M豆 哪来的圣诞饼干？

translation.en: Please. Give me some credit.
translation.zh: 拜托表扬表扬我嘛

translation.en: -Ah. There she is. Good morning, Kara. -Good morning.
translation.zh:
-看到你了 卡拉 早上好
-早上好

translation.en: Triple-shot juggernaut. Remixed just the way you like it.
translation.zh: 三倍浓缩咖啡 加了你喜欢的奶类

translation.en: -Oat milk? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
-是燕麦奶吗？
-没错

translation.en: -[giggling] Thank you. -We learned.
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-我们学会了

translation.en: Do you believe this, boss? My son's snake bit me.
translation.zh:
头儿 你信不信？
我被我儿子养的蛇咬了

translation.en: That's what I get for trusting the pet store.
translation.zh:
我相信那家宠物店
结果换来这种下场

translation.en: They told me it was harmless. Turns out to be a water moccasin.
translation.zh:
他们说这种蛇不会咬人
结果竟然是水蝮蛇

translation.en: [sighing] I'm so afraid it's gonna ruin the pitch.
translation.zh: 我担心会搞砸讲演会

translation.en: No, not at all. I mean, you can barely even see it.
translation.zh: 不会 绝对不会 伤势看起来并不明显

translation.en: No one will notice.
translation.zh: 没人会注意到的

translation.en: -Oh, thanks. -Merry Christmas.
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-圣诞快乐

translation.en: Is that who I think it is?
translation.zh: 是你吗？

translation.en: -Are you ready for the pitch? -I am now, Glen.
translation.zh:
-讲演会准备好了吗？
-准备好了 格兰

translation.en: -These are for you. Your favorites. -Thank you so much.
translation.zh:
-这是送给你的 是你的最爱
-感激不尽

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -Merry Christmas.
translation.zh:
-圣诞快乐
-圣诞快乐

translation.en: So The Molson Group called to confirm tomorrow's pitch,
translation.zh: 摩森集团打来敲定明天的讲演会了

translation.en: and Mr. Hanes wants to set a meeting with you and the partners,
translation.zh:
汉尼斯先生
也有意安排你和公司合伙人见面

translation.en: his words, "after we close this deal."
translation.zh: 套他说的话：“等客户签约后”

translation.en: You're about to become the first female partner in the history of this firm.
translation.zh: 你就快成为公司第一位女性合伙人了

translation.en: -If I close Molson. -Oh, you will.
translation.zh: 那我得先让摩森集团签约啊 你一定做得到的

translation.en: Well, not if Steve snakes it out from under me.
translation.zh: 前提是史蒂夫没有从中作梗

translation.en: -Hey, Steve. -Jess.
translation.zh:
-嗨 史蒂夫
-洁西

translation.en: Wow, I love your haircut. It, it kinda makes your nose look smaller.
translation.zh:
天啊 我好喜欢你的发型
让你的鼻子看起来更小

translation.en: Did you review the pitch document I sent you?
translation.zh: 看过我发给你的讲演文案了吗？

translation.en: Oh, yes, yes, I did. And I gotta say, I love reviewing your work.
translation.zh: 是 看过了 说真的 我很喜欢看你写的文案

translation.en: It just makes me feel more intelligent.
translation.zh: 让我觉得自己变聪明了

translation.en: Any notes?
translation.zh: 有没有做笔记？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Let's knock 'em dead in there tomorrow. All right?
translation.zh: 明天我们好好表现 好吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -You two thoroughbreds?
translation.zh:
-好的
-你们俩做得到吗？

translation.en: And, by the way, you close the deal, somebody's making partner.
translation.zh:
对了 说服客户签约的人
将成为公司的合伙人

translation.en: Partner.
translation.zh: 合伙人

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: Oh, you wish.
translation.zh: 想得美

translation.en: Just know, your team is here to help.
translation.zh: 提醒一下 你的团队很乐意帮忙

translation.en: Oh, you guys are the best. I think I've got it under control.
translation.zh: 你们是最棒的 但我应付得来

translation.en: I know, I know. You like to do everything yourself.
translation.zh: 我懂 你凡事都喜欢亲力亲为

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: You're so sweet, but ultimately, it is my responsibility.
translation.zh: 你有心了 但这终究是我的职责所在

translation.en: -Aye, aye, captain. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是 组长
-去吧

translation.en: There we go, CC. Take it down the field.
translation.zh: 茜茜 很好

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Literally the best soccer player I have ever seen.
translation.zh: 简直就是我见过最强的足球选手

translation.en: No offense.
translation.zh: 没有冒犯你们的意思

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 厉害

translation.en: Hey, Walker.
translation.zh: 沃克

translation.en: The War of 1812 called. It wants its cannon back.
translation.zh: 大战打响了 这次要把胜利抢回来

translation.en: -Thanks, Coach. -That is a foot!
translation.zh:
-过奖了 教练
-这才是国家

translation.en: Do I have a surprise for you.
translation.zh: 我有个好消息要告诉你

translation.en: A scout for the national team is comin' to the game tomorrow.
translation.zh:
国家队将派出一位球探
前来观察明天的赛事

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Your mom won't be happy, 'cause you'd have to leave home,
translation.zh:
你妈知道后一定会不高兴
毕竟你必须搬到外地住

translation.en: but this is an opportunity of a lifetime.
translation.zh: 但这是千载难逢的机会

translation.en: You play a flawless game and we win, you got nothin' to worry about.
translation.zh:
只要你打出毫无破绽的一战
让我们取得胜利 那就可以放心了

translation.en: So do that.
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: Don't do what I did when I had my shot
translation.zh: 别重复我当年的错 我本来有机会的

translation.en: and thought about everything that could go wrong.
translation.zh: 却因为顾虑太多而错失良机

translation.en: Could mean the difference between, uh, international athletic glory
translation.zh: 成为为国争光的运动员

translation.en: and coaching high school soccer and teaching science.
translation.zh:
以及高中足球队教练和科学老师
原来只在一念之间

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的安慰 感激不尽

translation.en: So just be yourself tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天尽管做自己

translation.en: -All right? -Okay.
translation.zh:
-知道吗？
-好的

translation.en: -And everything will be fine. -Everything will be fine.
translation.zh:
-不会有事的
-没错

translation.en: All right. I'm proud of you. You got this.
translation.zh: 好了 我为你感到骄傲 你可以的

translation.en: National team? C, this is freakin' huge.
translation.zh: 国家队？茜茜 太牛了

translation.en: Ava, it's time to go.
translation.zh: 艾娃 该回家了

translation.en: Mommy's late for her microdermabrasion appointment.
translation.zh: 我要去做微晶磨皮 快迟到了

translation.en: Okay, Mom. What do you think your mom will say about this?
translation.zh: 知道了 妈 你妈知道后会怎么样？

translation.en: She'll say, um… [in robotic voice] "I am Jess Walker. Definitely a human and not a robot."
translation.zh:
她会说：“我是洁西·沃克
我是百分百的人类 不是机器人

translation.en: "It is mathematically more favorable to give up on your dreams
translation.zh: 按照数学原理 放弃梦想

translation.en: in favor of a boring life identical to mine."
translation.zh:
过着跟我一样平平无奇的生活
更实际点”

translation.en: CC-Bear. Hi, honey. It's time to hit the road.
translation.zh: 茜茜宝贝 嗨 亲爱的 该出发了

translation.en: The planets wait for no one.
translation.zh: 行星可不等人

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 那…

translation.en: Hello. I am Angelica, and I have come to town.
translation.zh:
大家好 我叫安吉莉卡
今天来到你们的城市

translation.en: I have just what you need for Christmas.
translation.zh: 这个圣诞节 你们需要的正是我

translation.en: [Jess] CC, please.
translation.zh: 茜茜 拜托了

translation.en: [Angelica] Get a reading during the planetary alignment.
translation.zh: 迎接行星连珠期间 来算个命吧

translation.en: It will be magic.
translation.zh: 很神奇的

translation.en: Ah. This family looks like it could use a little Christmas magic.
translation.zh: 这一家人看起来缺了点圣诞魔法

translation.en: She says this to every family. We should go.
translation.zh: 她对每一户人家都这么说的 走吧

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -[Angelica] Stressed out mama.
translation.zh:
-感激不尽
-你这当妈妈的压力很大

translation.en: -I bet you work too hard. -How does she know that, Mom?
translation.zh: 我看你是工作太拼了 妈 她怎么知道的？

translation.en: Because if she said Dad worked too hard, it would be sexist.
translation.zh:
因为如果她说爸爸工作太拼了
那就是性别歧视

translation.en: It's not magic. It's performative liberalism.
translation.zh:
这不是什么魔法
只是演出来的自由主义行为

translation.en: We are on borrowed time with this baby. We need to go.
translation.zh: 宝宝不耐烦了 我们走吧

translation.en: -We're just here for the alignment thing. -[Angelica] Okay.
translation.zh:
-我们只是来观赏行星连珠的
-好的

translation.en: Just remember to open your hearts
translation.zh: 记得要敞开心房

translation.en: and view things through the lens of one another.
translation.zh: 用彼此的视角看待人事物

translation.en: -Yeah. -That'll give you the very thing you need.
translation.zh:
-好的
-这样你们就能心想事成了

translation.en: -Okay, thanks. -Bye.
translation.zh:
-好的 谢了
-再见

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Oh, we're gonna grab a snack. See you in the telescope room.
translation.zh:
我们去买点零食
一会儿在望远镜观测室会合

translation.en: -[Wyatt grunts] -[Bill] Wyatt, why are you trippin'?
translation.zh: 怀亚特 你怎么摔倒了？

translation.en: -Wow. -Come on, let me buy you ice cream.
translation.zh:
-天啊
-走吧 我请你吃冰淇淋

translation.en: Buy me some ice cream? Well, you know I struggle with dairy.
translation.zh:
请我吃冰淇淋？
你明知道我对乳制品过敏的

translation.en: -That's because you hold it in, Mom. -Well…
translation.zh:
-妈 那是因为你长期精神紧绷
-这个嘛

translation.en: You just gotta let it rip. Everybody farts.
translation.zh:
你只需要顺其自然
每个人都会放屁的

translation.en: -I don't. -Why would you torture yourself?
translation.zh:
-我不会啊
-你怎么老折磨自己？

translation.en: Just eat some ice cream and live in your body.
translation.zh: 吃点冰淇淋 别老自我限制

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: Hey, why are you being so nice to me?
translation.zh: 对了 你怎么突然对我这么好？

translation.en: Can't a daughter buy her mother some ice cream without raising suspicion?
translation.zh:
你就不能毫无疑虑地
让你女儿请你吃冰淇淋吗？

translation.en: [chuckling] Not really, no.
translation.zh: 不行 我做不到

translation.en: There's a scout from the national team coming to the game tomorrow,
translation.zh: 国家队的球探明天会来观察我们比赛

translation.en: and Coach thinks I have a pretty good shot of making it.
translation.zh: 教练认为我很可能会被球探相中

translation.en: Wow. Congratulations.
translation.zh: 天啊 真是可喜可贺啊

translation.en: But if I made it, I would have to leave home next year.
translation.zh:
但如果我真被球探相中
那明天就要搬到外地了

translation.en: What about college?
translation.zh: 大学不念了吗？

translation.en: CC, I know how much soccer means to you.
translation.zh: 茜茜 我能理解足球对你有多重要

translation.en: -Do you? -Trust me, I know.
translation.zh:
-你真的理解吗？
-相信我 我能理解

translation.en: I wasn't much older than you. I was Junior Olympics.
translation.zh:
我像你这个年纪时
也是青年奥运运动员

translation.en: I know, Mom. And I'm really sorry
translation.zh: 我知道 妈 你因为肩膀受伤

translation.en: you had to give up your career 'cause you hurt your shoulder,
translation.zh:
而必须放弃体育事业
我为你感到遗憾

translation.en: but this is completely different.
translation.zh: 但我的情况完全不同

translation.en: It's not. I had to start completely from scratch.
translation.zh: 大同小异 当年我不得不从零开始

translation.en: I'm just trying to protect you from that.
translation.zh: 我只是想避免你重蹈覆辙

translation.en: -If you just applied yourself-- -I hate when you say apply myself.
translation.zh:
-只要你换位思考…
-我最讨厌听你说这句话了

translation.en: Mom, we are different people.
translation.zh: 我们俩是不同的人

translation.en: You literally just want me to be you. It's suffocating.
translation.zh:
你只是希望我变成另一个你
我都快窒息了

translation.en: CC.
translation.zh: 茜茜

translation.en: [Bill] Big Yale interview tomorrow. You nervous?
translation.zh:
明天就要接受耶鲁大学面试了
紧张吗？

translation.en: Very, very nervous.
translation.zh: 非常紧张

translation.en: I'm afraid it might trigger my glossophobia.
translation.zh: 我担心演讲恐惧症会发作

translation.en: Oh, buddy, I didn't know you were scared of shiny things.
translation.zh: 小子 我不知道你有病

translation.en: It's the fear of public speaking, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸 我只是害怕在公开场合演讲

translation.en: Right. Right.
translation.zh: 也对

translation.en: Well-- Um, hey, you know what?
translation.zh: 你听我说

translation.en: Just pretend like it's our family holiday Christmas video.
translation.zh: 你就当是在拍摄圣诞全家福视频

translation.en: When you're with the family, you don't get so afraid. You used to crush those.
translation.zh:
跟家人在一起时 你都不会紧张
你以前可厉害了

translation.en: There's a fearless performer in there. I know it. Right?
translation.zh:
你内心藏着一股大无畏的表演精神
我是知道的 对吧？

translation.en: But it does beg the question…
translation.zh: 但问题来了

translation.en: You sure you're ready for college?
translation.zh: 你真做好心理准备上大学了吗？

translation.en: Right? I mean, you're just a freshman. You still got a lot of living to do.
translation.zh:
对吧？你才刚上高中
还有很多精彩的体验等待你去发掘

translation.en: All I know is I would do anything to be in your shoes right now.
translation.zh:
如果能过上你的生活
我愿意不惜一切代价

translation.en: Maybe it's why you chose a career that brings you back to the source of your fond memories.
translation.zh:
这也可能是你为什么选择
从事一份能重返昔日美好回忆的职业

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.zh: 瞧你说的

translation.en: [Jess] Excuse me.
translation.zh: 借过

translation.en: [sighing] Well, this was fun.
translation.zh: 真有意思

translation.en: Mom thinks I have an easy life,
translation.zh: 妈觉得我过得太轻松

translation.en: but she has no idea what it's like to be me.
translation.zh: 她完全不理解我的感受

translation.en: Yeah, I can relate.
translation.zh: 是啊 我懂的

translation.en: Dad expects me to have the same jocular, devil-may-care high school experience that he did,
translation.zh:
爸期待我能过上他以前充满欢笑
无忧无虑的高中生活

translation.en: but the problem is I'm not him.
translation.zh: 问题是我不是他啊

translation.en: What did we do so wrong as parents that our two teenagers wanna leave home?
translation.zh:
我们当父母的到底做错了什么？
两个青春期的孩子竟然要离家？

translation.en: Bill, this could be our last Christmas together.
translation.zh:
比尔 这很可能是
我们最后一次一起过圣诞了

translation.en: The alignment's about to start. Come on.
translation.zh: 五星连珠快开始了 走吧

translation.en: [woman] Next group, please.
translation.zh: 请下一组进来

translation.en: [Wyatt] Whoa.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Take Pickles.
translation.zh: 抱住泡菜

translation.en: [woman] Watch your step.
translation.zh: 走路小心

translation.en: -Exit to the left. -[Bill] Okay.
translation.zh:
-出口在左边
-好的

translation.en: This sucks. I really didn't wanna come to this today.
translation.zh: 好无聊 其实我今天不想来的

translation.en: This is actually not about you.
translation.zh: 重点不是你

translation.en: -This is about the family. -[Wyatt] My white whale. It's incredible.
translation.zh:
-是我们一家人在一起
-这是我日盼夜盼的奇观 太神奇了

translation.en: Wyatt, I really would appreciate--
translation.zh: 怀亚特 麻烦你…

translation.en: …don't care, but it means a lot to your brother, and we're a family.
translation.zh: 你弟很重视这项活动 我们是一家人

translation.en: It's never what we wanna do--
translation.zh: 你们从来不在乎我们想做什么

translation.en: Not a care in the world. You get up, have a little Gatorade--
translation.zh:
你过得太轻松了
一觉起来 喝点佳得乐…

translation.en: I wish you could be me.
translation.zh: 真希望你能体验一下我的生活

translation.en: I'd love for you to be me for one day. You wouldn't make it through lunch.
translation.zh:
我也希望你能体验一下我的生活
你绝对撑不到午餐时段

translation.en: You don't know how much effort I put in.
translation.zh: 你不理解我付出多少努力

translation.en: I gotta think about my job.
translation.zh: 我得烦工作

translation.en: I would love for you to know what it's like to be me.
translation.zh: 真希望你能体验一下我的生活

translation.en: -Believe it or not, I was young once. -Like 10,000 years ago?
translation.zh:
-信不信由你 我也年轻过
-那是很久以前了吧？

translation.en: Honestly, I wanna be you.
translation.zh: 说实话 真希望我是你

translation.en: I'd kill to eat a dozen doughnuts and have it burn right off.
translation.zh:
真希望我能吃下一打甜甜圈
也不会变胖

translation.en: What I wanna do is take a picture. I wanna take a picture.
translation.zh: 我只想拍张照 我要拍照

translation.en: -Yeah, okay. -Great, picture.
translation.zh:
-好的
-好啊 拍照吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -What? -Would you take a picture of my family?
translation.zh:
-是你？
-能帮我们一家人拍张照吗？

translation.en: Oh, it would be my pleasure.
translation.zh: 天啊 这是我的荣幸

translation.en: -CC, deliver this with a smile… -Better not post this.
translation.zh:
-茜茜 对那好心的大姐笑一个
-最好别放在社媒上

translation.en: -…to the nice lady. -I'd rather drink my own vomit.
translation.zh: 我宁可吞下自己的呕吐物

translation.en: Thank you. So you just follow what I ask.
translation.zh: 谢了 照着我的话做就对了

translation.en: Go up like that. Don't be naughty. Up. Up.
translation.zh: 上去 听话 都上去吧

translation.en: You go to the right. You go to the left. Good. Good.
translation.zh: 你站在右边 你则站在左边 很好

translation.en: Okay, Papa, suck it in. Your tummy is, you know, it's--
translation.zh: 很好 爸爸 吸气 你的肚腩…

translation.en: -Put the doggy in front of it. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-狗放在前面
-好的

translation.en: All right, everybody say, "Merry Christmas."
translation.zh: 好了 一起说“圣诞快乐”

translation.en: [all] Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: [Wyatt] Mom!
translation.zh: 妈

translation.en: [Jess] Miles!
translation.zh: 迈尔斯

translation.en: Watch out!
translation.zh: 小心

translation.en: That was crazy.
translation.zh: 好可怕啊

translation.en: -[Bill] Walkers, everybody okay? -Did we just break the telescope?
translation.zh:
-沃克全家都没事吧？
-望远镜被我们弄坏了吗？

translation.en: [CC] Mom, are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 妈 搞什么鬼？

translation.en: -[Jess] You okay, CC? -[CC] This is so embarrassing.
translation.zh:
-茜茜 你没事吧？
-好丢脸啊

translation.en: -Everybody, is everyone okay? -Mom, this is so embarrassing.
translation.zh:
-大家都没事吧？
-妈 这也太丢脸了

translation.en: [Bill] Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 赶紧出去吧

translation.en: Wyatt.
translation.zh: 怀亚特

translation.en: Pickles.
translation.zh: 泡菜

translation.en: Pickles, be qu--
translation.zh: 泡菜 给我安…

translation.en: -How'd you get past my security system? -What?
translation.zh:
-你怎么会绕过我的保安系统？
-什么？

translation.en: -What are you doing in my bed? -You're in my bed.
translation.zh:
-你怎么会躺在我的床上？
-是你躺在我的床上

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -Why am I in your bed, Dad? -Why am I in your bed, Mom?
translation.zh:
-爸 我怎么会躺在你的床上？
-妈 我怎么会躺在你的床上？

translation.en: -Why are you calling me Mom? -Why'd you call me Dad?
translation.zh:
-爸 你怎么会叫我“妈”？
-妈 你怎么会叫我“爸”？

translation.en: -Because you're Mom. -You're Dad.
translation.zh:
-因为你是妈啊
-因为你是爸啊

translation.en: -Stop calling me Dad. I'm not Dad. -Stop calling me Mom. I'm not Mom.
translation.zh:
-别叫我“爸”
-别叫我“妈” -我不是妈
-我不是爸

-快逃

translation.en: -Mr. Walker. -Ariana.
translation.zh:
-沃克叔叔
-爱莉安娜

translation.en: I'm so embarrassed about what happened with Wyatt.
translation.zh: 我和怀亚特刚刚相处得很尴尬

translation.en: -Wha-- What happened? -I don't know. Things got weird and…
translation.zh: 怎么了？ 我也不知道 情况变得很尴尬

translation.en: [girl] I'm so grounded!
translation.zh: 我要被禁足了

translation.en: -Don't you walk away from me. -You're a total double standard.
translation.zh:
-别走开
-你真是名副其实的双标

translation.en: I can't leave home to do the one thing I love,
translation.zh: 我不能出门做我爱做的事

translation.en: but you can do whatever you want.
translation.zh: 你却能为所欲为

translation.en: Look at you. You were right about that outfit. You look fly.
translation.zh:
瞧你这样子 你的服饰品味确实不错
你看起来神采飞扬

translation.en: But I am here, stuck in this hag body, and you're just out
translation.zh:
可是你瞧我
被困在这块皱巴巴的皮囊里 你却可以出门玩耍

translation.en: while I have your stupid friends and your psycho dog baby.
translation.zh:
留下我应付你那群白痴闺蜜
照顾那只变态的狗宝宝

translation.en: Is me having fun the problem?
translation.zh: 我开心有错吗？

translation.en: Because I thought the problem was me being a robot.
translation.zh: 我以为我的问题是想法太机械化

translation.en: [in robotic voice] "I am Jess Walker. Your criticism does not compute."
translation.zh:
“我是洁西·沃克
你对我的评价不符合逻辑”

translation.en: [normal voice] Maybe we should be having more fun.
translation.zh: 其实 我们可能需要多多放松

translation.en: We weren't there to have fun. We were trying to help Wyatt.
translation.zh:
我们擅闯派对的初衷不是去放松
而是想要帮帮怀亚特

translation.en: Yeah, right. When we walked in,
translation.zh: 是吗？我们走进屋内时

translation.en: you were literally doing the Electric Walker Slide.
translation.zh: 你们跳排舞跳得正起劲呢

translation.en: Your mother and I had a small moment for the first time in 20 years.
translation.zh:
这是我和你妈在过去20年来
第一次迎来小小的高光时刻

translation.en: -So what? -You also ruined things with Ariana, Dad.
translation.zh:
-有问题吗？
-爸 你还搞砸了我和爱莉安娜的苗头

translation.en: Things are not that bad. She tried to kiss me.
translation.zh: 没你想得那么糟糕 她想吻我

translation.en: -You stole my first kiss? -No. I pulled away.
translation.zh: 你竟然偷走了我的初吻？ 不是 我推开了她

translation.en: -You rejected Ariana? On my behalf? -God! Gosh!
translation.zh:
-你竟然替我拒绝了爱莉安娜？
-天啊

translation.en: -Dad. -Now I'm confused.
translation.zh:
-爸
-你把我搞糊涂了

translation.en: -I don't know what I'm supposed to do. -Let's go. Come on.
translation.zh:
-我到底该怎么反应才对？
-别跟他们多说 走吧

translation.en: -[CC] We're not done with this. -No.
translation.zh:
-我们还没说完呢
-够了

translation.en: -Oh, we're done. -I can't win with you.
translation.zh:
-没什么可说了
-我永远吵不赢你们

translation.en: I can't believe you left without permission.
translation.zh:
没想到你们竟然
未经我们同意下出门？

translation.en: -You left the house without my permission. -I don't need it. I'm an adult.
translation.zh:
-你不也经常一声不吭地出门吗？
-我是成年人 没必要报告行踪

translation.en: No wonder you're so confused.
translation.zh: 难怪你们会搞错身份

translation.en: [Jess] Get out of my room.
translation.zh: 滚出我的房间

translation.en: I'm not sleeping in here.
translation.zh: 我才不要睡在这里

translation.en: Gross.
translation.zh: 恶心

translation.en: [Bill] Dad, what are you doing? Get out of here.
translation.zh: 爸 你干什么？滚出我的房间

translation.en: [CC] Don't even think about it.
translation.zh: 门都没有

translation.en: [Bill] Nope.
translation.zh: 休想进来

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [man on radio] Ho, ho, ho, and feeling hot, hot, hot here on Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 天气好热 来到了圣诞前夕

translation.en: But keep the faith, people, because Santa is coming tonight,
translation.zh:
各位听众 别气馁
因为今晚圣诞老公公会到你家

translation.en: and he may just bring a Christmas miracle.
translation.zh: 还可能带来圣诞奇迹

translation.en: Hey, Wyatt, any news from Spock?
translation.zh: 怀亚特 史波克那边有消息吗？

translation.en: He says he should have the lens done by tonight.
translation.zh: 他说他应该能在天黑前把镜片做好

translation.en: We can last another day.
translation.zh: 我们应该还能撑过一天

translation.en: Thank goodness we got a second chance with Molson.
translation.zh:
好在摩森愿意
给我们第二次讲演的机会

translation.en: Call in sick to school and go straight to my office.
translation.zh:
打去学校替我请病假
然后直接赶去我的办公室

translation.en: Mom, wait, no. I have a math final today.
translation.zh: 妈 等等 不行 我今天有个数学大考

translation.en: It's 30% of my grade. You have to get to school.
translation.zh: 占总分的30% 你必须赶去学校

translation.en: Fine. Just try and stall them. I'll get there as fast as I can.
translation.zh: 好吧 尽可能拖住客户 我会尽快赶去

translation.en: Okay, but, Mom, if I am going to be you, I gotta be me.
translation.zh: 好的 妈 说真的 换做我是你 我会选择做自己

translation.en: -What does that mean? -It's--
translation.zh:
-这话什么意思？
-意思是…

translation.en: -It's gonna be great. -CC.
translation.zh:
-不会有事的
-茜茜

translation.en: I'll be right there.
translation.zh: 我这就赶去办公室

translation.en: Okay, guys, Mr. Molson and his team are on their way.
translation.zh:
听好 各位
摩森先生和他的团队在路上了

translation.en: We're gonna present our design for Jefferson Gardens,
translation.zh: 我们将为他们讲演杰弗森花园的设计

translation.en: but this time, we are going to do it as a team.
translation.zh: 只是这次我们将以团队的形式演示

translation.en: W-w-w-wait, so you don't want to do it all by yourself?
translation.zh: 等等 你不打算全程一个人完成？

translation.en: No. I need help, guys. I need you all.
translation.zh:
不了 我需要你们的帮忙
一个都不能少

translation.en: Whatever you need, your team is here to help. Right?
translation.zh:
需要什么尽管说
你的团队很乐意为你效劳 对吧？

translation.en: -Oh my gosh! -Of course.
translation.zh:
-天啊
-还用说嘛

translation.en: Okay, everyone has nicknames today.
translation.zh: 今天大家都会有个绰号

translation.en: -Ooh. Could I be Beyoncé? -She doesn't remember our names.
translation.zh: 我可以叫碧昂丝吗？ 她向来不记得我们的名字

translation.en: -Snake bite, did you ever play sports? -Field hockey in high school.
translation.zh: 被蛇咬的 你参加过体育项目吗？ 高中时期打过草地曲棍球

translation.en: Team sport. My girl.
translation.zh: 是团队运动 我喜欢

translation.en: There are gonna be a lot of questions, so you are in defense with Ramona Quimby.
translation.zh:
客户一定会抛出很多问题
所以你和“刘海蘑菇头”负责防守

translation.en: -It's the bowl cut, isn't it? -[all] Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是因为我顶着锅盖头吗？
-没错

translation.en: Okay, team, on three.
translation.zh: 好了 队友们 数到三 喊口号

translation.en: -Bring it in. Ready? -Great, I love it.
translation.zh:
-通通过来 预备
-很好 我喜欢

translation.en: You guys are the best.
translation.zh: 你们是最棒的

translation.en: One, two, three, team.
translation.zh: 一、二、三 团结一心

translation.en: -Yes! -Go!
translation.zh:
-好耶
-加油

translation.en: Well, that's everyone.
translation.zh: 好了 试卷都交上了

translation.en: I guess I can let you all go a little early.
translation.zh: 看来我可以让你们提早回家了

translation.en: Unless someone is brave enough to give the extra credit problem a try.
translation.zh: 除非有人想要尝试解决这道加分题

translation.en: CC.
translation.zh: 茜茜

translation.en: The answer you're looking for is 42.
translation.zh: 答案是42

translation.en: That's correct. I wasn't expecting anyone to get that.
translation.zh: 正确 没想到有人答得出来

translation.en: Well, you're actually asking the wrong question.
translation.zh: 其实是你问错问题

translation.en: -I am? -[boy] CC.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-茜茜

translation.en: -Please elaborate. -With pleasure.
translation.zh:
-请说明一下
-好啊

translation.en: It's essentially an architectural problem.
translation.zh: 这问题本质上与建筑学有关

translation.en: We're solving for a curvature equation using differential geometry.
translation.zh:
我们在使用微分几何学
来解决一个曲线方程问题

translation.en: But what's the vector analysis? Where are the planar quadrilaterals?
translation.zh: 问题是向量分析呢？ 平面四边形呢？

translation.en: And we must calculate for the cross-structural integrals.
translation.zh: 我们必须计算交叉结构积分

translation.en: -You know, guys, math is art. -[boy] Seriously?
translation.zh:
-各位 数学是一门艺术
-搞什么？

translation.en: Just look at the quadrature of Notre Dame, or even the Golden Ratio of the Parthenon.
translation.zh: 不妨参考巴黎圣母院的几何特征 要么参考帕特农神庙的黄金比例

translation.en: And even the Chaminar Monument in India uses the number four in its intervals.
translation.zh: 就连印度的查米纳塔门 也是利用“4”这个数字作为设计元素

translation.en: Right, guys? Come on.
translation.zh: 也是利用“4”这个数字作为设计元素 不是吗？

translation.en: Mr. Hollis, when do you think we'll have those results?
translation.zh:
霍利斯老师
我们什么时候能知道考试成绩？

translation.en: I'm worried about my grades.
translation.zh: 我担心我的学术表现

translation.en: Miss Walker, I think we both know where you stand.
translation.zh:
沃克小姐
我想我们都很清楚你的程度在哪里

translation.en: -It's really that bad, then? -What? No.
translation.zh:
-有那么差劲吗？
-什么？ 不会啊

translation.en: I mean, the progress that you've made this semester, it's been amazing.
translation.zh: 你这个学期进步了很多

translation.en: If your mom could see how hard you've been applying yourself,
translation.zh: 如果你妈知道你有多努力

translation.en: she'd be really proud.
translation.zh: 她一定会以你为荣的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: What do you mean it's not gonna be done on time?
translation.zh: 来不及做好？怎么说？

translation.en: Spock, I need that lens tonight before the planetary alignment ends.
translation.zh:
史波克 我今晚就要用到那块镜片
不然五星连珠就没了

translation.en: There are astrological implications.
translation.zh: 总之与天文现象有关

translation.en: You're the frontman. Heard great things. Ten million people watching tonight.
translation.zh:
你是主唱 风评很好
今晚有一千万人观赏

translation.en: Pressure's on. You know what they say.
translation.zh: 压力肯定不小 有句话说

translation.en: Burst pipes makes diamonds.
translation.zh: 压力造就成功

translation.en: Gwyneth, no more candles. Come on. Load up.
translation.zh: 格温妮丝 蜡烛够了 快点 通通装好

translation.en: Come on, bro. It's time. Let's roll.
translation.zh:
老兄 来吧 高光时刻到了
一起摇滚吧

translation.en: -Come on. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-快啊
-好的

translation.en: [muffled] You gonna be all right? Ready to do this?
translation.zh: 你还好吧？ 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: （老爸敢死乐队）

translation.en: -Kara? -Hm-mm.
translation.zh: 卡拉

translation.en: You don't know this, but my daughter, she's like a--
translation.zh: 你有所不知 我女儿是…

translation.en: -She's a really good soccer player. -Of course I know that.
translation.zh: 是个非常出色的足球员 我知道啊

translation.en: You've shown everyone here, like, no less than 1,000 videos of her playing.
translation.zh: 你一天到晚都让我们看她踢球的视频

translation.en: -I have? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-是啊

translation.en: She's awesome.
translation.zh: 她真的很厉害

translation.en: So I'm being a total control freak by killing a huge opportunity for her
translation.zh:
我是个彻头彻尾的操控狂 竟然搞砸了她离乡背井
加入国家队的大好机会

translation.en: to move away from home and play with the national team.
translation.zh:
竟然搞砸了她离乡背井
加入国家队的大好机会

translation.en: Jess.
translation.zh: 洁西

translation.en: You're not being a control freak.
translation.zh: 你不是操控狂

translation.en: You're just doing what you think is best for CC.
translation.zh: 你只是为茜茜做出最好的决定

translation.en: -Please. -Jess.
translation.zh:
-够了
-洁西

translation.en: You're my boss, and you're my role model,
translation.zh: 你是我的上司 也是我的楷模

translation.en: and I'd be thrilled if I could manage to balance work and family
translation.zh:
你能做到事业家庭兼顾
如果我能有你一半的能力

translation.en: even as half as well as you can.
translation.zh: 也算是人生一大成就了

translation.en: But you've taught me it comes with sacrifices.
translation.zh: 但是你教我要懂得牺牲的

translation.en: What sacrifices?
translation.zh: 牺牲？

translation.en: I mean, not like sacrifices because they're for your kids,
translation.zh:
但也不算是牺牲
毕竟你是为了孩子们

translation.en: and apparently, they're important.
translation.zh: 孩子才是最重要的

translation.en: I wouldn't know. I have hamsters. But, like, sacrifices.
translation.zh: 我理解不了 因为我只养了仓鼠 你做了很多牺牲

translation.en: Like how you've told me, you haven't taken a vacation in five years
translation.zh: 你说你已经有五年没去度假了

translation.en: so that you could pay for CC's soccer camps.
translation.zh: 只为了负担茜茜足球训练营的费用

translation.en: Or how you could've had this promotion three years ago,
translation.zh: 你早在三年前就有机会升职了

translation.en: but didn't want to miss her games.
translation.zh: 碍于你不想错过她的比赛

translation.en: It's what makes you the best mom I know.
translation.zh: 所以我认为你是最棒的妈妈

translation.en: We're gonna go in and kick ass,
translation.zh: 我们一会儿进去好好表现吧

translation.en: you, that beautiful tie, and those yellow pants.
translation.zh: 你的领带和黄色短裤都很帅

translation.en: Girl, you can pull anything off.
translation.zh: 丫头 没有事难得倒你

translation.en: CC.
translation.zh: 茜茜

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mom.
translation.zh: 妈 对不起

translation.en: -No, no, CC, stop. -I didn't understand how hard your job is.
translation.zh:
-茜茜 别这么说
-我以前不懂你的工作有多困难

translation.en: -And everything you do for our family. -No, no, CC.
translation.zh:
-你所做的一切都是为了我们家
-别这样 茜茜

translation.en: I'm the one who's sorry.
translation.zh: 该道歉的是我

translation.en: You were right, honey. Your way works for you,
translation.zh:
亲爱的 你说得对
你的办法是行得通的

translation.en: and it doesn't have to be my way to be a good way.
translation.zh: 我的办法不一定是好办法

translation.en: More than anything in this entire world,
translation.zh: 更重要的是

translation.en: I just want you to be okay.
translation.zh: 我只是希望你能过得好

translation.en: I will be okay
translation.zh: 我一定能过得很好

translation.en: 'cause I have the best mom in the world, and that's how she raised me.
translation.zh:
因为我拥有世界上最棒的妈妈
是她把我培养成最棒的孩子

translation.en: -Mom… -Hm.
translation.zh: 妈

translation.en: We are gonna W-A-L-K out of here and crush this pitch.
translation.zh: 我们马上出去 献上一出精彩的讲演

translation.en: -Because Walkers never quit. -Walkers never quit.
translation.zh:
-因为沃克家绝不轻言放弃
-绝不轻言放弃

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Hey. Yo, one, two, three, four.
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四

translation.en: Yo, Gabi. Yo, Gabi.
translation.zh: 盖比

translation.en: Can you guys believe this?
translation.zh: 真是难以置信

translation.en: They seriously expect us to sit up here
translation.zh: 他们竟然叫我们坐着观赏

translation.en: and listen to Walker's band play music instead of us.
translation.zh:
沃克老师的乐队表演
而不是叫我们上台表演

translation.en: Didn't Mr. Walker have a chance to play in Green Day?
translation.zh:
沃克老师以前不是有机会
加入绿日乐队吗？

translation.en: -I think it was Black Sabbath. -It was a band about a color.
translation.zh:
-是黑色安息日乐队才对吧？
-好像跟颜色有关的乐队

translation.en: Imagine giving up the opportunity to be a rock star
translation.zh:
为了当怀亚特的爸爸
他竟然放弃当摇滚巨星的机会

translation.en: just to be Wyatt's dad.
translation.zh: 你们能想象吗？

translation.en: -Like-- -That's sad.
translation.zh:
-简直…
-好可惜

translation.en: -[boy 1] Like that's-- -[boy 2] I'd rather be the rock star.
translation.zh:
-简直…
-我宁可当摇滚巨星

translation.en: Mr. Molson, Mr. Hanes,
translation.zh: 摩森先生、汉尼斯先生

translation.en: thank you so much for giving me the opportunity to speak with you again.
translation.zh: 感谢你们再给我一次机会为你们讲演

translation.en: You're safe today.
translation.zh: 今天不会有事的

translation.en: -No dairy for breakfast. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我早餐没吃过乳制品
-那就好

translation.en: Let's cut through the stench
translation.zh:
希望你能放下
昨天开会时的不愉快事件

translation.en: and talk to you about our beautiful building on 7th and Main.
translation.zh:
听我们讲演位于第七大道
和主要大道之间的大楼设计

translation.en: -That's right. Yup. -Jess.
translation.zh:
-没错
-洁西

translation.en: -[Steve] Everything all right? -[Molson] What's going on? Guys?
translation.zh:
-没事吧？
-怎么了？

translation.en: [Steve] What are we doing?
translation.zh: 这是什么情况？

translation.en: [Molson] Okay. Come on, guys.
translation.zh:
-够了
-没事… 快开始吧

translation.en: -All good? -He's leaving again.
translation.zh:
-没事吧？
-他又要走了

translation.en: No. Mr. Molson, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 摩森先生 很抱歉我做不到

translation.en: My family needs me.
translation.zh: 我的家人需要我

translation.en: But I'm proud to leave you in the very capable hands of this team.
translation.zh:
但我决定让我非常出色的团队
为你讲演 也为此感到骄傲

translation.en: They know these plans better than anyone. They'll show you every detail.
translation.zh:
他们非常熟悉这些设计
他们会向你展示所有细节

translation.en: You've got it.
translation.zh: 交给你们了

translation.en: We got it.
translation.zh: 放心吧

translation.en: Just hold on, Jess.
translation.zh: 洁西 等等

translation.en: Jess.
translation.zh: 洁西

translation.en: So starting with the exterior garden…
translation.zh: 先从外部花园开始

translation.en: [people shouting] We want the show! We want the show!
translation.zh: 我们要看演出 我们要看演出

translation.en: Do you not hear that? We want the show! Where's your guy?
translation.zh:
没听到吗？观众要看演出
你们的主唱呢？

translation.en: -Just one more minute. -I don't have a minute.
translation.zh:
-再等一分钟
-不能等了

translation.en: -Wyatt, where's your dad, man? -I don't know, Lake. I can't find him.
translation.zh:
-怀亚特 你爸呢？
-不知道 雷克 我找不到他

translation.en: We passed on a synchronized swim band for this.
translation.zh:
为了你们
我们推掉了一支花样游泳队

translation.en: -[Jess] Dad. -[CC] Bill.
translation.zh:
-爸
-比尔

translation.en: -We got here quickly. -Where's Wyatt?
translation.zh:
-我们已经尽快赶来了
-怀亚特呢？

translation.en: I've looked everywhere. I'm worried.
translation.zh: 我都找遍了 我很担心他

translation.en: -Let's go find him. -We want the show!
translation.zh:
-我们一起去找吧
-我们要看演出

translation.en: -Wyatt! -Wyatt, where are you, son?
translation.zh:
-怀亚特
-怀亚特 儿子 你在哪里？

translation.en: I feel like if I leave now, I'll miss out on way too much.
translation.zh:
如果我现在离开
就会错过许多美好的事

translation.en: Like what?
translation.zh: 怎么说？

translation.en: Well, sharing Mr. Mistletoe with you.
translation.zh: 比如跟你一起分享槲寄生先生

translation.en: You kiddin' me? That's how you know it's cake.
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑？这才叫来真的

translation.en: -So Minecraft later? -Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: 一会儿一起玩《我的世界》？ 好啊 没问题

translation.en: All right, we'll go on my server. Yours is a little cluttered.
translation.zh: 用我的服务器吧 你的有点拥挤

translation.en: It's not.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: Excuse me. Is this CC Walker's house?
translation.zh: 打扰一下 茜茜·沃克住在这里吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I, I'll grab her right now.
translation.zh: 是的 我去叫她

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: CC, Alex Sullivan from the US National Team.
translation.zh:
茜茜 我是亚历克斯·苏利文
是国家队的球探

translation.en: Yeah. Mr. Sullivan, I know who you are.
translation.zh: 苏利文先生 我认识你

translation.en: My flight got delayed because of this snowstorm,
translation.zh: 我的航班被暴风雪延误了

translation.en: so I thought I'd come in person and give you the news.
translation.zh: 于是我决定亲自来把好消息转告给你

translation.en: We'd like to officially give you another chance.
translation.zh: 我们想再给你一个机会

translation.en: Really? Even after that horrible game?
translation.zh: 真的吗？我比赛时的表现那么差劲

translation.en: We're looking for two things in our players.
translation.zh: 我们希望球员有两个特质

translation.en: Good soccer. Good character.
translation.zh: 球技精湛 心理素质良好

translation.en: I've seen your tapes. I knew you were a great soccer player.
translation.zh:
我看过你比赛的视频
我知道你是个出色的球员

translation.en: But when I saw you give up a game-winning goal
translation.zh: 可是当我看见你放弃致胜的一球

translation.en: to help an injured opponent, I knew you had both.
translation.zh:
回头帮助受伤的对手时
我知道这两种特质你都有

translation.en: Oh my gosh.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Can you hold on for one second? Hey, Mom?
translation.zh: 你可以等一下吗？ 妈

translation.en: It's a miracle.
translation.zh: 简直是奇迹啊

translation.en: This is the rep from the national team. He just offered me another chance.
translation.zh:
他是国家队的代表
他决定再给我一个机会

translation.en: But I'm, I'm saying no, right?
translation.zh: 但我应该拒绝的 对吧？

translation.en: Wait. No.
translation.zh: 等等 不行

translation.en: -Right. I'm so sorry-- -Wait, no, we're saying yes.
translation.zh:
-好的 很遗憾…
-等等 不是的 可以

translation.en: You have to say yes.
translation.zh: 你不能不答应

translation.en: And look, if soccer is the thing you love,
translation.zh: 听好 如果足球是你的热忱所在

translation.en: I'll be at every game.
translation.zh: 你每场比赛我都会到场支持

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Try and stop me.
translation.zh: 真的 谁也阻挠不了我

translation.en: Thank you!
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Okay, I have no idea what--
translation.zh: 这是什么情况？

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
translation.zh:
-好啊
-好啊

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: -This is yours. -Hey, guys!
translation.zh:
-这是你的
-各位

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -See you at the tryouts. -Thank you so much.
translation.zh:
-选拔赛见
-感激不尽

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: -What? -Oh my God.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-天啊

translation.en: This is glorious!
translation.zh: 真是太棒了

translation.en: [Angelica] Merry Christmas, Walkers!
translation.zh: 沃克家 圣诞快乐

translation.en: ♪ Of the year ♪
translation.zh: （沃克家祝大家圣诞快乐）

translation.en: I'm so sorry you're kissing your mother,
translation.zh: 很抱歉你必须跟你妈接吻

translation.en: who's also your sister.
translation.zh: 她也是你姐

translation.en: -I'm so sorry-- -Don't worry about it.
translation.zh:
-很抱歉
-放心吧

translation.en: Upon meeting you,
translation.zh: 见到你后

translation.en: you seem more like a middle-aged man of middling intelligence.
translation.zh:
我觉得你更像
一个智商平平的中年男子

translation.en: Low. Middling to low intelligence.
translation.zh: 是低智商 智商介于中低之间的中年男子

translation.en: Sort of an Ed Helms type.
translation.zh: 有点像艾德·赫尔姆斯的类型

translation.en: What are your safety schools?
translation.zh: 你的保底学校是什么？

translation.en: And you--
translation.zh: 你…

translation.en: Bazooka. Mark.
translation.zh: 火箭筒 打板

translation.en: [man] Drink it ugly, and it'll work.
translation.zh: 狠狠地喝 可以的

translation.en: I don't-- I am a 50-year-old refined person.
translation.zh: 我不能…我是个50岁的文明人

translation.en: [man] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: So gross. Oh my gosh.
translation.zh: 好恶心 天啊

translation.en: I am an ungrateful malcontent
translation.zh: 我是个不知感恩的人

translation.en: who has no idea the kind of sacrifices people make for me.
translation.zh: 没意识到别人为我做过什么牺牲

translation.en: Beelzebub. Mark.
translation.zh: 别西卜 打板

translation.en: Sorry? I can't hear you 'cause I have my earbuds.
translation.zh: 对不起 我听不见 我塞了耳塞

translation.en: Threw it in his face. He caught it. Threw it back.
translation.zh: 扔到他脸上 他接住 扔回给我

translation.en: I bounced it. Bounced it. Bounced it.
translation.zh: 我打 不断地打

translation.en: You saved my marriage.
translation.zh: 是你拯救了我的婚姻

translation.en: I tore a hammie.
translation.zh: 我拉伤了大腿后肌

translation.en: Go on without me.
translation.zh: 别管我

translation.en: You've nothing to worry about. Your puppy and baby are in very capable hands.
translation.zh:
放心吧
你们家的小狗和宝宝都不会有事的

translation.en: [laughing] Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Are they gonna kill us? They're freaking me out.
translation.zh: 她们会杀了我们吗？我被她们吓坏了

translation.en: Can you unshave my legs?
translation.zh: 可以把腿毛还给我吗？

translation.en: [laughing] Go back.
translation.zh: 再来一遍

translation.en: That's how you do it, ladies.
translation.zh: 女士们 这才像话嘛

translation.en: This is not how I thought my life would turn out.
translation.zh: 我没想到我的人生会变成这样

translation.en: -Everything's gonna be fine. -Yeah, Coach?
translation.zh:
-不会有事的
-知道了 教练

translation.en: -Yeah, CC? -I can't breathe.
translation.zh:
-知道吗 茜茜？
-我喘不气了

translation.en: He's laughing.
translation.zh: 他笑场了

translation.en: Please leave this room and never return.
translation.zh: 请走出这个房间 别再回来了

translation.en: Has she cracked?
translation.zh: 她崩溃了吗？

translation.en: -Emma. -Oh [bleep].
translation.zh: 我的妈啊

translation.en: It's great.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -Is that-- -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-可以了吗？
-可以了

translation.en: I'm on a new cleanse where I just eat everything,
translation.zh:
我刚加入一项排毒计划
可以随心所欲地吃

translation.en: and then that's it.
translation.zh: 毫无顾虑

translation.en: Kiss me. Kiss me.
translation.zh: 吻我
